## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or features?

## Use Cases
Provide specific examples of how this feature would be used.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request.

## Premium Feature?
- [ ] This should be a FREE feature (functional)
- [ ] This could be a cosmetic premium perk

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this hasn't been requested
- [ ] This feature aligns with the bot's mission
- [ ] I understand this is a volunteer project and features may take time
